options.content:
Water Plant

Overview - PSQL

targets.query:
from(bucket: "csobsidian's Bucket")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "chemicalScale")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Weight")
    |> last()

    |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 0.1}))

options.content:
Clear Well

Level

Water Tower

Level

Raw Water

Flow, Totals

Water Quality

pH, Turbidity, Chlorine

targets.query:
low_level = from(bucket: "csobsidian's Bucket")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "clearWell")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "LowLevel")
    |> last()
    //|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value + 1.0}))
    //|> yield(name: "low_level")

high_level = from(bucket: "csobsidian's Bucket")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "clearWell")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "HighLevel")
    |> last()
    //|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: (r._value + 1.0) * 2.0}))
    //|> yield(name: "high_level")

//join(tables: {t1: low_level, t2: high_level}, on: ["_time"])
union(tables: [low_level, high_level])
    |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "_field"])
    |> sum()

from(bucket: "csobsidian's Bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "waterMeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor_id == "Raw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Flow")
  
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)

from(bucket: "csobsidian's Bucket")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "waterMeter")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor_id == "Raw")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Flow")
    |> last()

    //|> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 0.001}))

from(bucket: "csobsidian's Bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ph")
  |> drop(columns: ["sensor_id"])
  |> drop(columns: ["location"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)

from(bucket: "csobsidian's Bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "turbidity")
  |> drop(columns: ["location"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)

from(bucket: "csobsidian's Bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "turbidity")
  |> drop(columns: ["location"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)

from(bucket: "csobsidian's Bucket")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "waterMeter")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor_id == "Raw")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "TotalToday")
    |> last()
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 0.001}))

from(bucket: "csobsidian's Bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "waterMeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor_id == "Raw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Flow")
  
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)

from(bucket: "csobsidian's Bucket")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "waterMeter")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor_id == "Raw")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "TotalToday")
    |> last()
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 0.001}))

low_level = from(bucket: "csobsidian's Bucket")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "clearWell")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "LowLevel")
    |> last()
    //|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value + 1.0}))
    //|> yield(name: "low_level")

high_level = from(bucket: "csobsidian's Bucket")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "clearWell")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "HighLevel")
    |> last()
    //|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: (r._value + 1.0) * 2.0}))
    //|> yield(name: "high_level")

//join(tables: {t1: low_level, t2: high_level}, on: ["_time"])
union(tables: [low_level, high_level])
    |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "_field"])
    |> sum()
